level.heading: Federal Reserve regulations and operating circulars.
level.text: Regulations of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and operating circulars of the Federal Reserve Banks supersede any inconsistent provision of this article to the extent of the inconsistency.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-95
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-95, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28:4A-101.
